EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Agile Series #2 - EMEA - 2015.01.15.Email - Follow Up - Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our Lessons Learned From Agile Testing webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Lessons Learned from Agile Testing
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for attending our webinar, "Lessons Learned from Agile Testing." We hope you found the webinar informative and helpful. Your active participation and engaging questions made the difference.
Click here <http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-od-agile-series-2-emea-watch.html> for a recording of this webinar.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Wolfgang Platz Founder and Chief Product Officer Tricentis
Ingo Philipp Product Manager Tricentis
